page.title: 16SOCIAL CONCERNS IN OFFLEY.
page.content:
PUBLIC TRANSPORT.Many people in Offley have asked the local bus company to provide a more frequent bus service for them.At present only some of the buses travelling from Luton to Hitchin are routed through the village others go via the bypass.The Parish Council have written supporting this request the bus company considers the present service adequate they have however agreed not to procede with their plans to further reduce the service.
PARKING IN THE VILLAGE HIGH STREET.It has been requested that cars should not be allowed to park on both sides of this street as it is exceedingly narrow and it is a great inconvenience to the residents.The public houses do provide car parks but these are not adequate.The police have been asked to investigate this problem.
